query.q: eval(A/B, A="M::`jvm_jvm`:(LAST(`memory_used_bytes`)) { `application` = '#{application}' and `host` = '#{host}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `area` = 'heap' } BY `application`", B="M::`jvm_jvm`:(LAST(`memory_max_bytes`)) { `application` = '#{application}' and `host` = '#{host}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `area` = 'heap' } BY `application`")

eval(A/B, A="M::`jvm_jvm`:(LAST(`memory_used_bytes`)) { `application` = '#{application}' and `host` = '#{host}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `area` = 'nonheap' } BY `application`", B="M::`jvm_jvm`:(LAST(`memory_max_bytes`)) { `application` = '#{application}' and `host` = '#{host}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `area` = 'nonheap' } BY `application`")
M::`jvm_jvm`:(LAST(`gc_pause_seconds_count`) AS `GC 次数`) { `application` = '#{application}' and `host` = '#{host}' and `env` = '#{env}' } BY `application`
M::`jvm_jvm`:(LAST(`memory_used_bytes`) AS `used`) { `application` = '#{application}' and `host` = '#{host}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `id` = '#{jvm_memory_pool_heap}' } BY `application`, `env`, `id`
M::`jvm_jvm`:(LAST(`memory_max_bytes`) AS `max`) { `application` = '#{application}' and `host` = '#{host}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `id` = '#{jvm_memory_pool_heap}' } BY `application`, `env`, `id`

M::`jvm_jvm`:(LAST(`memory_used_bytes`) AS `used`) { `application` = '#{application}' and `host` = '#{host}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `id` = '#{jvm_memory_pool_nonheap}' } BY `application`, `env`, `id`
M::`jvm_jvm`:(LAST(`memory_max_bytes`) AS `max`) { `application` = '#{application}' and `host` = '#{host}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `id` = '#{jvm_memory_pool_nonheap}' } BY `application`, `env`, `id`
eval((A-B)/A, A="M::`jvm_disk`:(LAST(`total_bytes`) AS `已使用`) BY `application`, `env`, `host`", B="M::`jvm_disk`:(LAST(`free_bytes`) AS `已使用`) BY `application`, `env`, `host`")

title: JVM 监控视图 by Micrometer
